data.title: Yves Laferrière -
data.meta_description: Yves Laferrière (born 1943) is a Québécois bassist and composer who played in the bands Contraction and the Ville Emard Blues Band during the 1970s. In 1978, he released a self-titled solo album on Le Tamanoir. Discography: Yves Laferrière (1978) Artist/Album Pages:Stanton Davis' Ghetto Mysticism Stanton Davis (born Nov. 10, 1945) is an American trumpeter […]
data.text:
Yves Laferrière (born 1943) is a Québécois bassist and composer who played in the bands Contraction and the Ville Emard Blues Band during the 1970s. In 1978, he released a self-titled solo album on Le Tamanoir.

Discography:
